participant_1.background:
My family is supportive of my musical dreams, and we often go to the opera together.
I love to go to concerts with my friends because we can all sing and dance along.
I am a hard worker, and I don't let my height get in the way of my work.
My future clients will love how I've combined my love of cleanliness and my talent for planning to create the best wedding days of their lives.
I like to make things with my hands.

participant_2.background:
I like playing music and being outside, even when it's not the best weather.
i speak fluent french.
I fell and sprained my ankle while hiking last year.
i volunteer in my sons boy scout troop.
i am almost finished with my degree.

content.text: Hi! I'm glad to meet you.
Thank you, nice to meet you too!
I enjoy playing music and being outside, even when it's not the best weather.
That sounds fun! I like to go to concerts with my friends.
That's cool! Do you have any favorite bands or musicians?
I like a lot of different music, but I'm especially into indie rock and folk music.
Nice! I like those genres too. What are some of your favorite bands?
I like The Shins, The National, and Fleet Foxes.
Oh, I love The Shins! I've seen them in concert a few times.
Yeah, they really are. What are some of your favorite songs by them?
I love "New Slang" and "Caring is Creepy".
Those are both great songs! I also like "Simple Song" and "Australia".
I'm glad we have similar taste in music.
